name: Monster Attack to Earth
description:
Avoid the destruction of the earth by monsters.

Tap the screen to activate the protections on the ground and prevent the monsters from destroying the world.

Various game modes. You have three game modes, and each with more monsters to avoid.

Reorder this chaotic world, try to survive the monsters that won't stop attacking and return home safe and sound.

Download now this addictive game!

Includes the following features:

● Endless game mode

● Progressive difficulty

● Flat, simple and elegant user interface

Share with your friends and challenge them to beat your high score.
